articleData.blog_content:
The first article I wrote was regarding the Gorkhaland issue in Darjeeling, which was highly appreciated by the entire team. Subsequently, I became a permanent member of the Desire family and started my internship with Desire. Being a part of Desire really improved my writing skills, and I gained the invaluable experience of writing about a variety of social issues. The team encouraged me to grow, professionally and improve my writing skills by giving a voice to my thoughts. I also learnt to work effectively in a team, and be a good leader.

Desire also gave me amazing Friendships that I will cherish always. Initially I struggled as a coordinator, but the team motivated me to continue and I was able to successfully complete a year as a coordinator. Even though I have worked with Desire from a distance, I still consider the entire team as my family, and it has been an amazing experience so far!
